    Create project function, with feature: Can only be handling one project within an application period (from application opening date, inclusive, to application closing date, inclusive)

    Generating an applicant report; a list of applicants with their respective applications, with flat type, age, marital status and filtering based on applicant's choice of flat type

    Rejecting applicant's applications, but using the assumption that they are only able to access the applications for their own managed projects

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(IStorage storage)
      Create project function, with feature: Can only be handling one project within an application period (from application opening date, inclusive, to application closing date, inclusive)

    • showProjectslist

      public List<String> showProjectslist(IStorage storage)
      function to show list of projects, so that it is easier for manager to select which project they would like to perform an action for, by choosing a number, rather than having to type out a long name

    • showManagedProjectslist

      public List<String> showManagedProjectslist(IStorage storage)
      same function as above, but only for the projects the manager is managing/has created

    • editProject

      public void editProject(IStorage storage)
      function to edit the different fields of the project, other than visibility, which has its own "toggle visibility" function. did not allow edits for certain fields, such as neighborhood (would be difficult or almost impossible to change location of a current project), project name (unique identifier which would likely not be edited due to causing much confusion), types of flats (fixed to only 2 types in this scenario), manager(automatically tied to manager who created the project), officers, officers applying and officers rejected (all 3 will be modified through different methods of accepting, rejecting officers applying)

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(IStorage storage)
      function to delete project

    • viewAllProjects

      public void viewAllProjects(IStorage storage)
      function to view all created projects, including projects created by other HDB Managers, regardless of visibility setting.

    • viewCreatedProject

      public void viewCreatedProject(IStorage storage)
      Able to filter and view the list of projects that they have created only. uses same structure as viewing all functions, but ensures created by is the user ID

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(IStorage storage)
      To toggle the visibility of the project to “on” or “off”. Instead of toggling, for user convenience the manager can select either 0 for not visible or 1 for visible, to ensure that they are selecting the visibility they would like to opt for, reducing mistakes in toggling to an incorrect visibility state

    • viewHDBOfficerRegistration

      public void viewHDBOfficerRegistration(IStorage storage)
      View pending and approved HDB officer registration

    • decideOfficerApplication

      public void decideOfficerApplication(IStorage storage)
      Combined function to to approve or reject HDB Officer’s registration as the HDB Manager in-charge of the project and update project’s remaining HDB Officer slots

    • approveApplicantApplication

      public void approveApplicantApplication(IStorage storage)
      Approving applicant's applications, but using the assumption that they are only able to access the applications for their own managed projects

    • rejectApplicantApplication

      public void rejectApplicantApplication(IStorage storage)
      Rejecting applicant's applications, but using the assumption that they are only able to access the applications for their own managed projects

    • approveWithdrawalRequest

      public void approveWithdrawalRequest(IStorage storage)
      Approving withdrawal request: application is set to unsuccessful as long as there is a valid application

    • rejectWithdrawalRequest

      public void rejectWithdrawalRequest(IStorage storage)
      Rejecting withdrawal request: Application status changed to withdrawal rejected if withdrawal is rejected

    • generateApplicantReport

      public void generateApplicantReport(IStorage storage)
      Generating an applicant report; a list of applicants with their respective applications, with flat type, age, marital status and filtering based on applicant's choice of flat type
